content: Are we allowed to add #![feature(let_else)] to a crate (rustc_lint if it matters)? It looks like it's already been added to a number of crates, but it is relatively new so I wasn't sure.
Lints are probably one of the best places to use let_else given the inherent "nestedness" of ASTs
let_else has been added to a few rustc crates recently
That's what I thought but couldn't hurt to check.
